context.finalInstructions:
You are an assistant specialized in creating video scripts and teleprompter content. You are addressing {{userName}}{{appName}}.

IMPORTANT for MEMORY:
- Memory information is sorted by date, the most recent is the most valid
- If you see contradictory preferences, ALWAYS use the most recent one
- Consolidated information reflects the user's latest preferences
- DO NOT mention past contradictions, only talk about current preferences

IMPORTANT for GREETINGS:
- Only say "Hello", "Hi" or other greetings if it's the FIRST message of the conversation
- In an ongoing conversation, respond DIRECTLY without greetings
- If the user says hello during conversation, you can respond briefly but don't start your other responses with greetings

Be professional, creative and adapt your responses to their specific needs.

privacy.importantNoteContent: By using CamPrompt AI, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy. We are committed to informing you of any significant changes with at least 30 days' notice via an in-app notification.
privacy.introduction: At CamPrompt AI, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy transparently describes how we handle your information when using our smart teleprompter application.
privacy.readCompletelyToContinue: Read the policy completely to continue

aiUsage.content: CamPrompt AI allows you to use your own API keys to access AI services (OpenAI, Google Gemini, Mistral, etc.). Your API keys are securely stored on your device and are NEVER transmitted to our servers. You are responsible for using your API keys in accordance with each provider's terms of service. AI-generated scripts remain your exclusive property.
aiUsage.title: AI Usage and API Keys

contact.content:
For any questions regarding this privacy policy or your personal data, contact us:

contact.title: Contact and Support

dataCollection.content:
CamPrompt AI only collects:
â€¢ App preferences (theme, language)
â€¢ Technical settings (video quality, scroll speed)
â€¢ Local usage statistics (number of scripts, recording duration)

This data remains on your device and is only used to improve your experience.
dataCollection.title: Data Collected

dataProtection.content: All your data (scripts, videos, settings) are stored exclusively on your device. CamPrompt AI operates offline and does not require any connection to our servers for basic features. We have no access to any of your personal creations.
dataProtection.title: Data Protection

dataSharing.content:
CamPrompt AI NEVER shares your personal data with third parties. The only exceptions are:
â€¢ If you choose to export your videos to social networks
â€¢ If you use your own API keys (direct communication with the chosen service)
â€¢ If required by law (we would inform you unless legally prohibited)
dataSharing.title: Data Sharing

dataUsage.content:
The collected data is used exclusively for:
â€¢ Personalizing your experience
â€¢ Saving your preferences
â€¢ Optimizing app performance
â€¢ Providing personal usage statistics

No data is used for marketing or advertising purposes.
dataUsage.title: Data Usage

localStorage.content: Your scripts, videos, and settings remain on your device. No automatic cloud synchronization is performed. If you choose to use Firebase synchronization (optional), your data is encrypted and you retain full control over what is synchronized.
localStorage.title: 100% Local Storage

noTracking.content: CamPrompt AI contains no advertising trackers, no invasive analytics, and no ads. We do not monetize your data. The app is funded solely by optional purchases and your support.
noTracking.title: Zero Tracking - Zero Ads

permissions.content:
CamPrompt AI only requests essential permissions:
â€¢ Camera: to record your videos
â€¢ Microphone: to capture audio
â€¢ Storage: to save your creations
â€¢ Face ID/Touch ID (optional): to secure your API keys

Each permission can be revoked at any time in your device settings.
permissions.title: Transparent Permissions

updates.content: CamPrompt AI updates regularly include security and privacy improvements. We recommend keeping the app up to date. Release notes always detail privacy-related changes.
updates.title: Updates and Security
